letter.body: After viewing the 'K.G.B.' style of interrogation, by the group fondly referred to as Waxman's Wretched Wackos, I felt compelled to write the enclosed letter. As a smoker (for more than three decades), I am outraged by the attack on you and your peers. I must, however, commend you on not allowing the aforementioned bureaucratic buffoons to bully you, as they do to other industries.
